title: Clans: A few questions.
body:
Ok so im interested in the clan system as I have run some fairly successful (400 members minimum was my smallest group, 12000 was one of the bigger ones i admined (didnt own that one)) and would more than likely build up yet another group within league.

So i am wondering what tools we would get as clan leaders and more importantly what benefits there are to a clan aside from telling people apart.

First off, Will there be an option to show only clan members in the invite window.

Secondly, will we get a clan tab like our friends list but for as mentioned, clan members.

Thirdly, will this  tie in at all into the hextech crafting system (for instance queue with 5 clan members for an increased chance at a key drop or something like that)

And lastly, will we or will we not get clan chat built into the mobile app.

replies.body:
Clan system? I assume you mean the Club system that's currently on PBE.

I'm not sure if you've seen it already but **Surrender at 20** has a really informative post about this, that might answer some of your questions. I recommend you check it out [here](http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html#unreleased).

If it's not on there, it's probably not a feature. **Moobeat** is really good at picking up on the small things usually.

Keep in mind though it is the PBE, so anything can change at any time. What we see there now might be very different to what goes on to live, if anything at all.

Yep ive seen it, it answers none of my questions.

Edit: Oh and when did you become an emissary, grats dude.

If it's not on there it's likely not a yet feature then.

I did notice that when **Moobeat** invited people you could see their tag next to their name. 
As you can see here:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wd96meO_owg/VqqhzdazMoI/AAAAAAAA3bU/Ilq2wSmDKwM/s1600/inlobby.jpg

That might be useful for seeing who's in your clan when inviting, but looks like there wont be a "sort by clan" feature, like you were looking for just yet.

I'd love to speculate a bit with you, but I'm actually discouraged on giving out too much speculation. Since people might view it as "official" in some way because of my emmisary status :(
Bummer can only hope, from my experience if riot wants to get sub-communities going and they want it to be more than just a gimmick they need to give mods adequate tools for the job.
